entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
